description:
Lina wanders an unfamiliar land with a pig as her guide. She finds Zelgadis acting strangely and uses her magic to break free from the odd realm - only to discover that Filia might not want to leave!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Disaster and Danger? This Place Is a Wonder Island!
Malheur et péril ? Nous sommes sur une étrange île !
Yakunan Kinan? Koko wa Fushigi no Shima!
Несчастье и опасность? Это Остров чудес!
厄難奇難? ここは不思議の島!
